dimensions: Warp x Weft: 60 x 57 cm (23 5/8 x 22 7/16 in.)
title: Shells II
medium:
Medium: flax, linen
Technique: satin weave with interlocking tapestry
description: Four large, white curving shell shapes are inlaid in a dark grey weft satin ground by means of interlocking tapestry.  Within the shell shapes, texture and patterning are created by contrasting twill and satin weaves.
name: Hanging
